title: 820-3023-a shuts down on battery power.
message:
Hi, got an 820-3023-a that shuts down on battery power. It doesn't do it if charger is connected (either with battery or without battery connected).

It has no visible corrosion, U7000 looks great.

title: 820-3023-a shuts down on battery power.
message:
Does it go off immediately when charger is disconnected?
If yes, check 3V42_G3H with battery alone.
